title: Wasmer (YC S19) Is Hiring Rust Engineers and Eng. Managers
description:
At [Wasmer](https://wasmer.io) we are working on the software that will power the next generation of Cloud Computing platforms using WebAssembly.
Similarly to Node.js, we are moving WebAssembly to the server-side but completely emancipated from JavaScript.

Read more about us here: https://wasmer.io/posts
